channel.title: 3 problems, i need to fix them, please help
channel.description:
problem #1.
how can i make it so i can make a npc say more than one thing? (example: "get ur pk stuff here" and after he says that, he says, then he says "my pk armour owns" <===fixed
problem #3. How do i make it so super pots were off and dont stay the same...
problem #2.
Sometimes when people are walking, they appear where they arent and even walk through walls, its like there noclipping but lag, but its not lag... nor noclipping, and they can see people, but other people cant see them unless the press the "invisible armour quest" then they show up. This doesnt happen alot, just sometime and it gets really annoying.... any1 help pleasE? thanks!

item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

the problem #2 is if some1 clicks the training room emote and you see them appear, then they walk away and click it again you dont see them go to the same spot again, so what happens is when they are actually back at the door you see them at the same place still so when they move you see them run through walls.

either delete training room emote button or find a way to make an appearance update for everybody

item.title: 3 problems, i need to fix them, please help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i can help with problem 1 but not 2 sorry
ok
go into npchandler and look for “moo” then add
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “get your pk stuff here!”;
}
then add
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “my pk armour owns!”;
}

Read full topic
